Lotto: Waikato punter crowned 12th multi-millionaire of 2024, winning $4.5m days after record $50m jackpot https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-waikato-punter-crowned-12th-multi-millionaire-of-2024-looking-45m-days-after-must-win-draw/4FM2PNM37BAOPCXZWHVUHK5JRI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-waikato-punter-crowned-12th-multi-millionaire-of-2024-looking-45m-days-after-must-win-draw/4FM2PNM37BAOPCXZWHVUHK5JRI/ Tonight’s winner is the 12th multi-millionaire of 2024. Wed, 12 Jun 2024 11:03:23 +0000 A Waikato punter is $4.5 million richer tonight, striking the Lotto Powerball jackpot just four days after the mammoth $50 million must-be-won draw.
Tributes for Kiwi surfer missing off Western Australia beach, search called off indefinitely https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tributes-for-kiwi-surfer-missing-off-popular-western-australia-beach-search- Called-off-indefinitely/F5OBIT3L5VEHFCWUNNM6AYQGFE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tributes-for-kiwi-surfer-missing-off-popular-western-australia-beach-search- Called-off-indefinitely/F5OBIT3L5VEHFCWUNNM6AYQGFE/ Benjamin PlummerThe father of three hasn't been seen since Friday. Wed, 12 Jun 2024 09:04:02 +0000 An emergency search for the 47-year-old launched on Friday was called off indefinitely on Wednesday afternoon.

Waikato woman sent injured child overseas to avoid prosecution https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-woman-sent-injured-child-overseas-to-avoid-prosecution/K2JCFPZAMJDLJB7MZH7VGIT7OQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-woman-sent-injured-child-overseas-to-avoid-prosecution/K2JCFPZAMJDLJB7MZH7VGIT7OQ/ Belinda FeekThe 35-year-old was accused of assaulting the girl who turned up at school with injuries. Wed, 12 Jun 2024 07:11:48 +0000 Waikato mother of eight, Meleseke Aogamalie, 35, was sentenced to 12 months' supervision on a charge of attempting to pervert the course of justice after putting a child on a plan overseas to avoid a police investigation. Photo / 123rf
Scott Watson: Lawyers ask for appeal to be allowed but no retrial ordered https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/scott-watson-appeal-defence-says-hair-evidence-wasnt-reliable-for-conviction/V7M35TXS5BFGZBK6NKPYYRZLXU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/scott-watson-appeal-defence-says-hair-evidence-wasnt-reliable-for-conviction/V7M35TXS5BFGZBK6NKPYYRZLXU/ Catherine HuttonWatson's lawyer: Police concertedly and repeatedly used suggestive practices to secure ID. High Court trial starts in the alleged murder of Bob Kleiman https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/high-court-trial-starts-in-the-alleged-murder-of-bob-kleiman/6R75PSJ4RBAENHDKBYS4ML2G7U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/high-court-trial-starts-in-the-alleged-murder-of-bob-kleiman/6R75PSJ4RBAENHDKBYS4ML2G7U/ Sarah CurtisMurder accused and two alleged accomplices on trial in High Court at Whangarei Wed, 12 Jun 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Ike Wellington Kingi is on trial in the High Court at Whangarei, accused of murdering Bob Kleinman at an Onerahi house, in October 2022. His partner Leonie Farrell and a friend Stacy Jamieson are also on trial for charges alleging they tried to help Kingi escape conviction. Photo / Michael Cunningham
